dashboard - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.DashboardTest
 
Dashboard - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model
The class dashboard represent the dashboard of the player, so inside the class are stored the graveyard (last ccard played) the canteen, the entrance, the towers and the color of tha player who owns the dashboard, the class dashboard is a way to unify all this elements in the game so is method are principally setter and getter

Creator of entity Dahboard.
DashboardTest - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model
This class contains the test for the class Dashboard
DashboardTest() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.model.DashboardTest
 
DecoratedRule - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model.rules
The class DecoratedRule is inherited by all the Rules that are not the DefaultRules and that modify the behaviour of some aspects of the game, in particular reimplement (override) the methods of the interface Rule
DecoratedRule() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.model.rules.DecoratedRule
This method is the constructor of the class
DefaultRule - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model.rules
The class DefaultRule represent the rule when there are no character cards active, so the methods of the interface rule implemented represent the default rule of the normal game
DefaultRule() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.model.rules.DefaultRule
 
defaultRules - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.rules.DecoratedRule

deregisterConnection(Connection) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
This method is used to deregister a connection, it removes the connections from the list of active connections and notify other players in the game that the connection with one of the other player has been closed
disableColor(Player, Color) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
This method disable a Color after a character is activate
disableIsland(Island) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
This method disable an island (if a token is placed)
disconnectedPlayer(String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
This method is called when a player leave the game, reports to all the players to disconnect
